name: Worms War: Middle Age
description:
Norms War: Middle Age is a turn-based board game that describes a war in the fantasy world dominated by worms. There are several independent forces in this world, and each player will be acted as the king of one of these forces. Through continuous strategies, operations, attacking and occupying lands from the map, the player will defeat another by decreasing the player’s or player’s home chip to 0. Players can be allowed to use cooperating to beat another player during the process. The game will produce a final winner when there is only one player left in the game.

https://playingcards.io/uhjnmn
